messages.title: MY PLAN FOR HEALTH IN WEST CORNWALL
messages.content: My focus as your MP has been to work with NHS leaders to find ways to provide the health and care you need, when you need it and delivered by the right professional when you need it. Delivering this is helped by the Conservative Government’s investment in Cornwall’s hospitals - £11m for West Cornwall and St Michael’s hospitals, £100m for a Women and Children’s Hospital, £40m for a new oncology unit and other projects at Treliske, the £11m adolescent mental health unit in Bodmin, up to £450m for a new hospital, and in excess of a £24m boost for Cornwall Council’s social care budget.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservative Government’s investment in Cornwall’s hospitals includes £11m for West Cornwall and St Michael’s hospitals, £100m for a Women and Children’s Hospital, £40m for a new oncology unit and other projects at Treliske, the £11m adolescent mental health unit in Bodmin, up to £450m for a new hospital, and more than a £24m increase for Cornwall Council’s social care budget.

issues.health: Investment in Cornwall’s hospitals as described under key policies.

politicalExperience.achievements: Working with NHS leaders to provide health and care.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet calls for feedback on healthcare priorities through survey completion via email or post.
